validation.invalid_scope: Invalid scope. Must be GLOBAL or SESSION

permission.only_super_admin_create_org: Only super administrators can create organizations
permission.only_super_admin_delete_org: Only super administrators can delete organizations
permission.only_activate_own_cluster: You can only activate clusters in your organization
permission.only_view_own_cluster: You can only view clusters within your organization
permission.only_update_own_cluster: You can only update clusters within your organization
permission.only_delete_own_cluster: You can only delete clusters within your organization
permission.only_super_admin_reassign_cluster: Only super administrators can reassign cluster organization
permission.org_admin_cannot_override_org: Organization administrators cannot override organization assignment
permission.org_admin_cannot_reassign_user: Organization administrators cannot reassign user organization
permission.org_admin_cannot_reassign_role: Organization administrators cannot reassign role organization

rules.runtime_filter_ineffective: Runtime Filter failed to filter data effectively. May be due to filter build failure, timeout, or poor filter selectivity.
rules.high_memory_usage: Operator memory usage is too high, may cause query failure or trigger Spill. Check for data expansion or oversized intermediate results.
rules.fragment_memory_high: Fragment memory usage is too high, may cause query failure.
rules.join_explosion: Join output is significantly larger than input, usually due to missing Join condition causing Cross Join, or incorrect Join condition causing 1:N matching.
rules.wrong_build_side: In Hash Join, Build side data is larger than Probe side, causing oversized HashTable. Optimizer may have chosen wrong Build side due to inaccurate statistics.
rules.broadcast_too_large: When joining small and large tables, Broadcast Join broadcasts the small table to all nodes. But when Build side data is too large, it increases network and compute costs. May be due to inaccurate statistics causing optimizer to misjudge table sizes.
rules.local_exchange_memory_high: Please refer to StarRocks official documentation for more information.

suggestions.check_runtime_filter: Check if Runtime Filter is generated
suggestions.check_join_condition: Check if JOIN condition is missing or incomplete
suggestions.run_analyze_table: Run ANALYZE TABLE to update statistics
